hero.quote: For where two or three gather in my name, there am I with them. — Matthew 18:20

missionAbout.missionText: Our mission is to spread love, serve our community, and grow together in faith.
missionAbout.aboutText: We are a community-driven church with a focus on fellowship, faith, and service. Our community is composed of Ethiopian Christians in Denmark, united by our shared culture and faith. Learn more about our history, which began with a group of dedicated believers coming together to create a supportive spiritual home away from home. Our goal is to strengthen our community bonds, offer support to newcomers, and spread hope through faith-based initiatives and outreach programs.

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.text: The Ethiopian Church in Denmark was founded to serve the Ethiopian community, offering a place of worship, community, and support. Our journey started with a small group of devoted individuals who wanted to create a home away from home, where everyone could gather, share their faith, and grow spiritually. Today, we are proud to be a growing community that welcomes all who seek faith, comfort, and connection.

missionVision.title: Our Mission and Vision
missionVision.mission: Our mission is to provide a welcoming and supportive environment where people of all backgrounds can come together to worship, grow in faith, and serve the community. We strive to be a beacon of hope and a source of spiritual guidance for the Ethiopian community in Denmark.
missionVision.vision: Our vision is to build a thriving, faith-filled community that nurtures spiritual growth, promotes cultural heritage, and positively impacts the lives of those around us. We envision a future where our church serves as a bridge between cultures, fostering unity and understanding.

ourBeliefs.title: Our Beliefs
items: We believe in one God, the Father Almighty, Creator of heaven and earth.
We believe in Jesus Christ, His only Son, our Lord, who was conceived by the Holy Spirit and born of the Virgin Mary.
We believe in the Holy Spirit, the Lord, the giver of life, who proceeds from the Father and the Son.
We believe in the community of faith and the importance of worship, fellowship, and service.
